text: Danilo Gomes Cintra (born 28 May 1985) is a Brazilian football player who is a free agent. ==Club career== He made his Primeira Liga debut for Académica de Coimbra on 15 August 2011 in a game against União de Leiria. ==Honours== ;Académica de Coimbra *Taça de Portugal: 2011–12 ==References== ==External links== Category:1985 births Category:Sportspeople from Rio de Janeiro (state) Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Centro de Futebol Zico players Category:Quissamã Futebol Clube players Category:Macaé Esporte Futebol Clube players Category:Associação Académica de Coimbra – O.A.F. players Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Portugal Category:Primeira Liga players Category:G.D. Chaves players Category:LigaPro players Category:Associação Desportiva Recreativa e Cultural Icasa players Category:Associação Desportiva Cabofriense players Category:Central Sport Club players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Danilo Cintra
